Download Mix08 Videos

Posted by davidhayden on March 10, 2008

My daughter downloaded a number of the Mix08 Videos onto my Zune this weekend. If like me you weren’t able to attend Mix08, you can head over to http://sessions.visitmix.com/ to download them with your favorite Download Manager.


I actually watched a few of them and gave a little review of each:



  • MIX08 Video Presentation – ADO.NET Data Services Framework with Mike Flasko

  • ADO.NET Data Services with Pablo Castro – MIX08 Session Video

  • MIX08 Presentation : Real-World AJAX with ASP.NET Video by Nikhil Kothari

  • Building Great AJAX Applications from Scratch Using ASP.NET 3.5 and Visual Studio 2008 – MIX 08 Presentation

  • ASP.NET Dynamic Data Websites Presentation at Mix 08

 


I enjoyed all the videos, but I am guessing the highlight at Mix must have been the release of Silverlight 2 Beta 1 / Tools and Internet Explorer 8 Beta 1. Microsoft didn’t release any new versions of ADO.NET Data Services and ASP.NET DynamicData Framework and a number of blogs I have been reading suggest many people were not happy with the Mix08 release of the MVC Framework.


Still, I am convinced I need to attend Mix next year. Too many cool people and cool technologies happening in a cool location The new bits for ADO.NET Data Services and ASP.NET DynamicData Framework appear to be just around the corner, too.
